name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Glenn Howard LEWIS, Appellant

judges: Before ROBERTS, C.J., and NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON and ZAPPALA, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Glenn Howard LEWIS, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
456 A.2d 145
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Glenn Howard LEWIS, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 27, 1983.
Decided Feb. 3, 1983.
Michael R. Muth, Richard E. Deetz, Asst. Public Defenders, for appellant.
James F. Marsh, Dist. Atty., for appellee.
Before ROBERTS, C.J., and NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON and ZAPPALA, JJ.
